tours.name: New York Central Park Tour

free_cancellation.title: Free Cancellation
free_cancellation.description: Cancel up to 24 hours in advance for a full refund.

health_precautions.description: Special health and safety measures apply. Learn more.

descriptions.title: Discover the Beauty of Central Park
descriptions.text: Experience the iconic Central Park of New York City, with scenic views, historical landmarks, and lush green spaces. This tour is perfect for nature lovers and anyone wanting to explore the heart of NYC.
activities: Walk through famous spots like Bethesda Terrace and Bow Bridge.
Learn about the history of Central Park.
Enjoy the natural beauty and serenity of the park.

what_is_included.title: What's Included
list: Access to all Central Park locations

health_precautions_list: Face masks required for travelers in public areas.
Hand sanitizer available to travelers and staff.

address.location_details: Meet behind the Bethesda Terrace, look for the Central Park sign.
address.name: Central Park, New York

inclusions: Entry fees to Central Park locations

traveller_reviews.name: John Doe
traveller_reviews.review_description: This was the best part of my trip to New York! I loved every second of the tour, and the guide was fantastic. Highly recommend!

traveller_reviews.name: Emily Smith
traveller_reviews.review_description: We did this tour as a family, and it was perfect. Lots of interesting facts about Central Park, and we had a lot of fun.

descriptions.title: Experience the Beauty of the California Coast
descriptions.text: Travel along the iconic California coast, from Los Angeles to San Francisco. Explore scenic coastal towns, beautiful beaches, and top-notch local eateries.
activities: Visit iconic spots like Santa Monica, Big Sur, and San Francisco.
Enjoy scenic drives along the Pacific Coast Highway.
health_precautions_list: Social distancing on buses and at stops.
Masks required indoors and on transport.

address.location_details: Tour starts at Los Angeles International Airport.
address.name: Los Angeles, California

traveller_reviews.name: Chris Martin
traveller_reviews.review_description: This tour was an amazing way to see the California coast. From the stunning views to the fantastic local guides, it was a trip of a lifetime.

descriptions.title: Explore the Alaskan Wilderness
descriptions.text: Venture deep into Alaska's pristine wilderness with this four-day safari. Encounter wildlife, take a river cruise, and explore dramatic landscapes.

address.location_details: Tour starts at Anchorage International Airport.
address.name: Anchorage, Alaska

traveller_reviews.name: Jane Doe
traveller_reviews.review_description: A once-in-a-lifetime experience! Our family loved every moment of the safari, and the wildlife encounters were unforgettable.

descriptions.title: Visit the Iconic Sydney Opera House
descriptions.text: Join a guided tour of the world-famous Sydney Opera House, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Explore its stunning architecture and learn about its rich history.
activities: Discover hidden areas not usually open to the public.
Learn about the Opera House's fascinating history.

traveller_reviews.review_description: The Sydney Opera House tour was beyond amazing! The architecture and the backstage access were incredible. Highly recommend!

descriptions.title: Explore London's Historic Landmarks
descriptions.text: Join a historical walking tour of London and explore famous landmarks like the Tower of London, Westminster Abbey, and more.
activities: Visit the Tower of London and see the Crown Jewels.
Walk through the streets of Westminster.
See iconic landmarks like Big Ben and Buckingham Palace.
